text: Aurora Metro Center station is a light rail station on the R Line in Aurora, Colorado, USA. It is located at Centrepoint Drive and Sable Boulevard. There is the shopping center and the Aurora Municipal Center (city hall, police headquarters, central library, and history museum) near it. == References == Category:Railway stations in the United States Category:Buildings and structures in Colorado Category:Transport in Colorado Category:Aurora, Colorado
title: Aurora Metro Center station
